necessary.name: Alapvető sütik
necessary.description: Ezek a sütik elengedhetetlenek a weboldal megfelelő működéséhez. Alapvető funkciókat tesznek lehetővé, mint az oldalak közötti navigáció és a biztonságos területekhez való hozzáférés. A weboldal nem tud megfelelően működni ezen sütik nélkül.

functional.name: Funkcionális sütik
functional.description: Ezek a sütik megjegyzik az Ön preferenciáit és beállításait, mint például a nyelv választás és a téma, hogy személyre szabottabb élményt nyújtsanak.

analytics.name: Analitikai sütik
analytics.description: Ezek a sütik segítenek megérteni, hogyan használják a látogatók a weboldalunkat anonim információk gyűjtésével és jelentésével. Ez segít javítani a weboldal teljesítményét és felhasználói élményét.

marketing.name: Marketing sütik
marketing.description: Ezeket a sütiket a látogatók webhelyeken keresztüli követésére és személyre szabott hirdetések megjelenítésére használják. Segítenek mérni marketing kampányaink hatékonyságát.

site.name: Astro-Seek Review: Comprehensive Free Astrology Calculator Portal
site.tagline: A feature-rich platform offering free birth charts, compatibility analysis, and advanced astrological tools across nine languages.
site.overview:
Astro-Seek stands as one of the most comprehensive free astrology portals available online, offering an extensive suite of calculation tools that rival paid services. The platform provides detailed birth chart analysis, compatibility calculators, transit tracking, and specialized features like astrocartography and Vedic astrology support.

What distinguishes Astro-Seek is its depth of customization options, including 24+ house systems, 26 sidereal ayanamsas, and over 100 asteroid calculations. The celebrity database containing 94,768 charts adds research value, while the moon calendar and numerology subdomains extend functionality beyond traditional astrology.

Created and maintained by Prague-based developer Petr Soural, the platform demonstrates technical excellence in astronomical calculations while remaining accessible to beginners through clear navigation and educational content. The entirely free model supported by non-intrusive advertising makes professional-grade astrological tools available to everyone.

features.name: Birth Chart Calculator
features.description: Comprehensive natal chart generation with planetary positions, house placements, aspects, and interpretations across tropical and sidereal systems with 24+ house system options.

features.name: Compatibility and Synastry Analysis
features.description: Love matching calculator comparing two birth charts with mutual aspects, lunar phase matching, and detailed synastry interpretations for relationship insights.

features.name: Transit Chart Calculator
features.description: Real-time planetary transit tracking against natal charts with customizable orbs, aspect filtering, and daily to monthly personal horoscope forecasts.

features.name: Celebrity Birth Chart Database
features.description: Searchable database of 94,768 celebrity charts with advanced filters for sun signs, occupations, nationalities, and specific planetary placements.

features.name: Sidereal and Vedic Astrology Support
features.description: Full Vedic/Jyotish functionality with 26 ayanamsa systems, Kundli calculations, Nakshatra support, and Vimshottari Dasha planetary periods.

features.name: Moon Calendar and Lunar Tracking
features.description: Comprehensive lunar phase calendar with void of course moon times, Arabic moon mansions, eclipse schedules, and health/surgical timing guidance.

features.name: Solar and Lunar Return Charts
features.description: Birthday-based predictive charts calculating the exact moment the Sun returns to natal position, with relocatable calculation options.

features.name: Asteroid Astrology Calculator
features.description: Extensive asteroid support with over 100 celestial bodies including Ceres, Pallas, Juno, Vesta, dwarf planets, and mythological asteroids.

features.name: Astrology Calendar with Ephemeris
features.description: Historical and future planetary data spanning 1800-2100 with retrograde schedules, ingresses, aspects, and downloadable ephemeris tables.

features.name: Numerology Calculator Suite
features.description: Life path number, personal year, birthday number, and name numerology calculations with interpretive guidance.

features.name: Real-Time Current Planets Display
features.description: Live planetary position tracker with animation capabilities showing celestial movement across configurable time intervals.

features.name: Multi-Language Interface
features.description: Full localization across nine languages with dedicated translator teams maintaining accuracy in astrological terminology.

pros.details: All features including advanced calculations, celebrity database access, and unlimited chart generation are available without payment or subscription requirements.
Supports 24+ house systems, 26 sidereal ayanamsas, tropical and Vedic astrology, and specialized techniques like draconic charts and Arabic parts that typically require paid software.
Ephemeris data spanning 1800-2100, automatic daylight saving time calculations via Olson TZ database, and precise coordinate handling ensure reliable chart calculations.
94,768 celebrity charts with 330,534 movie entries provide research opportunities and learning examples unavailable on most competing platforms.
Nine language translations maintained by dedicated astrology translators make the platform accessible to a global audience while preserving technical accuracy.
Adjustable aspect orbs, minor aspect inclusion, chart graphics styling, and display preferences allow users to configure calculations to match their preferred methodology.
Guest users have no data stored; calculations are processed and immediately erased, with registered users having full control over data retention and deletion.

cons.details: The interface uses a classic web design aesthetic from the early 2010s with dark blue headers and orange navigation that may feel less modern compared to contemporary astrology apps.
The previously active forum and user messaging features have been closed, eliminating opportunities for community interaction and peer learning.
While calculations are precise, the automated interpretations lack the personalized depth of professional consultations or premium AI-powered astrology services.
Google AdSense placements throughout the interface can distract from the user experience, though non-personalized ads are served in EU/California regions.
The wealth of options and technical terminology may overwhelm newcomers who lack foundational astrology knowledge, despite clear navigation structure.

freeTier.limitations: Ad-supported platform with banner advertisements; forum and messaging features discontinued

pricing.valueAssessment: Astro-Seek delivers exceptional value as a completely free service that rivals paid astrology software costing $50-300 annually. The depth of features, calculation accuracy, and database resources would command premium pricing on competing platforms. For users seeking comprehensive astrological tools without financial commitment, Astro-Seek represents the gold standard in free astrology resources.

history.story:
Astro-Seek was created and is maintained by Petr Soural, a self-described "enthusiastic astrology nerd, programmer, graduated architect and Lunatic photographer" based in Prague, Czech Republic. Born on May 9, 1983, Soural combined his technical programming skills with passion for astrology to build one of the internet's most comprehensive free astrology platforms.

The platform has grown organically through Soural's dedication, eventually assembling an international team of astrology translators who have localized the site into nine languages. Each translator maintains expertise in astrological terminology within their language, ensuring technical accuracy across all versions.

Despite its independent origins, Astro-Seek has evolved into a sophisticated platform featuring multiple specialized subdomains for horoscopes, moon calendars, celebrity charts, numerology, and time tools. The site demonstrates the founder's commitment to providing professional-grade astrological calculations at no cost to users worldwide.

primaryUsers: Astrology enthusiasts seeking free chart calculations
Students learning Western and Vedic astrology
Moon phase and lunar cycle followers
targetAudience.idealFor:
Astrology Students: The platform provides educational value through its extensive celebrity database, allowing students to study chart patterns across thousands of examples while learning to interpret various house systems and aspect configurations.

Budget-Conscious Practitioners: Professional astrologers can access calculation tools comparable to paid software without subscription costs, making it ideal for those building their practice or seeking secondary verification tools.

Vedic Astrology Practitioners: Full Jyotish support with 26 ayanamsas, Kundli calculations, Nakshatra tracking, and Dasha systems makes this one of the few free platforms adequately serving the Vedic astrology community.

Relationship Compatibility Seekers: Synastry calculators with detailed aspect analysis and lunar phase matching help individuals explore romantic compatibility through astrological frameworks.

Research-Oriented Astrologers: The celebrity database with advanced filtering enables systematic research into planetary patterns, aspect correlations, and chart signatures across occupational categories.
targetAudience.notIdealFor:
Users Seeking Personalized AI Interpretations: Those expecting conversational AI analysis or deeply personalized readings will find the automated interpretations more generic compared to modern AI-powered astrology apps.

Mobile-First Users: While responsive, the desktop-oriented interface with extensive options creates a more complex mobile experience compared to dedicated astrology mobile applications.

Complete Beginners Without Guidance: Users with no astrology foundation may feel overwhelmed by technical options and terminology without external educational resources to guide their exploration.

navigation.notes: Clear main navigation with logical subdomain organization separating horoscopes, moon calendar, celebrity database, and numerology. Dropdown menus provide quick access to specific calculators, though the sheer number of options requires familiarization.

design.notes: Functional but dated design with dark blue header, orange navigation bar, and traditional web layout. Prioritizes information density over modern aesthetics. Dark mode option available in user settings for visual comfort.

mobileExperience.notes: Responsive design adapts to mobile screens, though the feature-rich interface is optimized for desktop use. Chart graphics scale appropriately but complex calculators work best on larger screens.

accessibility.notes: Alternative link color options available for accessibility. Standard form controls and text-based content support screen readers. No explicit WCAG compliance documentation found.

pageSpeed.notes: Pages load reasonably quickly despite data-heavy content. Chart generation requires server-side calculation time. Ad placements may impact perceived performance on slower connections.

depth.notes: Exceptional calculation depth with professional-grade astronomical data. Interpretations cover fundamental aspects but lack the nuanced analysis of human astrologers. Reference materials and methodology explanations demonstrate expertise.

multimedia.qualityNotes: Interactive chart graphics with customizable visual styles. Planet position animations available. No video tutorials or multimedia educational content. Chart images export cleanly for sharing.

contactability.notes: Direct email contact via info@astro-seek.com. Founder Petr Soural identified with public profile. FAQ recommended before email contact for common issues.

legitimacy.notes: Founder openly identified with birth date and biographical information. International translator team credited with profile links. Clear attribution establishes accountability.

legal.notes: Combined Terms & Conditions page with privacy policy. GDPR and CCPA compliance explicitly addressed. Cookie policy on separate page. SSL encryption confirmed. European hosting with GDPR-compliant provider.

trustCredibility.summary: Astro-Seek demonstrates strong trustworthiness through transparent founder identification, clear privacy practices, and GDPR/CCPA compliance. The platform has established credibility over years of operation with a growing international community. Guest data is not retained, and registered users maintain full control over their information. The absence of a physical business address and formal company registration reflects its independent project nature rather than concerning legitimacy issues.

faq.question: What is Astro-Seek and what does it offer?
faq.answer: Astro-Seek is a comprehensive free astrology portal offering birth chart calculations, compatibility analysis, transit tracking, and specialized tools like astrocartography and Vedic astrology support. The platform includes a celebrity database with over 94,000 charts, moon calendar tracking, numerology calculators, and ephemeris data spanning 1800-2100. All features are completely free to use.

faq.question: Is Astro-Seek completely free to use?
faq.answer: Yes, Astro-Seek is entirely free with no premium tiers, subscriptions, or paywalled features. Users can access unlimited chart calculations, the full celebrity database, all calculator tools, and create personal accounts at no cost. The platform is supported through non-intrusive advertising, with non-personalized ads served to EU and California users for privacy compliance.

faq.question: Is Astro-Seek accurate and trustworthy?
faq.answer: Astro-Seek demonstrates high astronomical accuracy using professional ephemeris data spanning 1800-2100 and the Olson timezone database for automatic daylight saving calculations. The platform is created and maintained by Petr Soural, an identified Prague-based developer with transparent privacy practices including GDPR and CCPA compliance. Guest data is not stored, and calculations are processed then immediately erased.

faq.question: Does Astro-Seek support Vedic astrology?
faq.answer: Yes, Astro-Seek offers comprehensive Vedic astrology support including 26 different ayanamsa systems (Lahiri, Raman, Krishnamurti, and more), Kundli calculations with Arudha Lagna, Nakshatra lunar mansion tracking, Vimshottari Dasha planetary periods, and Sade Sati analysis. This makes it one of the most capable free platforms for Jyotish practitioners.

faq.question: How do I calculate my birth chart on Astro-Seek?
faq.answer: Navigate to the Birth Chart Calculator, enter your date of birth, exact birth time (if known), and birth city or coordinates. The system automatically handles timezone and daylight saving adjustments. You can customize house systems, select tropical or sidereal zodiac, and include optional points like asteroids, Chiron, and Lilith. Results display planetary positions, aspects, and interpretations.

faq.question: Can I compare compatibility between two people on Astro-Seek?
faq.answer: Yes, the Compatibility Calculator allows you to enter birth data for two individuals and generates synastry analysis showing mutual planetary aspects, lunar phase matching, and interpretive guidance. You can customize house systems, aspect orbs, and include minor aspects for detailed relationship analysis across romantic, friendship, or professional contexts.

faq.question: What languages does Astro-Seek support?
faq.answer: Astro-Seek is available in nine languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Russian, Italian, French, Turkish, and Korean. Each translation is maintained by dedicated astrology translators who ensure technical terminology accuracy. Users can switch languages through the site navigation or account settings.

faq.question: Does Astro-Seek have a mobile app?
faq.answer: Astro-Seek does not offer a dedicated mobile app, but the website features responsive design that works on mobile devices and tablets. The feature-rich interface is optimized for desktop use, so complex calculations and chart viewing work best on larger screens, though basic functionality remains accessible on smartphones.

faq.question: How does the celebrity chart database work?
faq.answer: The Famous People database contains 94,768 celebrity birth charts searchable by name, birth date, nationality, occupation, and astrological factors like sun sign, moon sign, or ascendant. Advanced searches filter by specific planetary positions, aspects, and retrograde motion. Results include full natal charts, transit calculations, and synastry comparisons with other celebrities.

faq.question: What is the moon calendar feature on Astro-Seek?
faq.answer: The Moon Calendar subdomain tracks lunar phases, void of course moon periods, Arabic moon mansions, and solar/lunar eclipses. It includes health and surgical timing guidance based on moon signs, spanning years 1900-2035. Users can find precise lunar phase times, moon sign transitions, and plan activities according to traditional lunar astrology principles.

summary.recommendation:
Astro-Seek represents an exceptional resource in the astrology landscape, delivering professional-caliber calculation tools without any cost barrier. The platform's feature depth rivals paid software costing hundreds of dollars annually, making it indispensable for budget-conscious astrology practitioners and enthusiasts alike.

The site excels for users seeking comprehensive birth chart analysis, compatibility calculations, and specialized techniques like Vedic astrology, asteroid tracking, and solar returns. Students benefit tremendously from the celebrity database's research potential, while experienced practitioners gain reliable secondary verification tools. The nine-language support democratizes access across global audiences.

Those seeking modern, mobile-first experiences with AI-powered personalized interpretations should explore newer platforms designed for casual users. The classic interface and technical depth assume some foundational astrology knowledge, potentially overwhelming complete beginners without external guidance. The discontinued forum removes community learning opportunities that complemented the tool suite.

Overall, Astro-Seek earns an 8.5/10 rating as an Excellent platform that sets the standard for free astrology resources. Its unmatched feature-to-price ratio, calculation accuracy, and customization options make it a must-bookmark site for anyone serious about astrological study. The dated design and generic interpretations represent minor trade-offs against the extraordinary value delivered at zero cost.

callToAction.ctaDescription: Discover your planetary placements, house positions, and natal aspects with Astro-Seek's comprehensive free birth chart calculator.
